text: “Ia deragh uari bagh gan! Ia borir dozir kabar tongɨn tav gɨnɨghnɨgh kamaghɨn mɨkɨman markɨ, a pura bizim.18:10-11 Akar faraghavɨra itimɨn, Grighɨn akam ghaze, “borir dozir kaba.” Akar otevir kam uaghan, ves 6 ko ves 14ɨn iti. Akar kam Matyu 10:42, uaghan an iti, egha ghaze, “Suren gumazir ziaba puvatɨziba.” Iesus ti boribara mɨgeir puvatɨ, a uaghan uan suren gumazir igharazibav gei. Puvatɨ. Kɨ ia mɨgei, men enselba zurara nan Afeziar uan Nguibamɨn itimɨn damazimɨn iti.”18:10-11 Akar abuananamɨn, fofozir gumazir maba ghaze, mɨgɨrɨgɨar otevir mam uaghan vezɨn kamɨn iti. Akar kam ghaze, “E fo, Gumazamizibar Otarim gumazamizir tuavim ataghiziba iniasa ize.”
